Package uk.pallas.systems.categr.services

Class CategoriesDAO

java.lang.Object
uk.pallas.systems.categr.services.CategoriesDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
uk.pallas.systems.categr.services.CategoriesDAOService
@Service public class CategoriesDAO extends Object implements uk.pallas.systems.categr.services.CategoriesDAOService
Service which builds on CategoryRepository, this will retrieve objects from the database and process them to retrieve specific data for other components to make use of (e.g. extract all name fields).
